title: Of the horyble and woful destruccion of Ierusalem and of the sygnes and tokens that were seene before it was destroied: which distruction was after Christes assension. xlii. yeares. To the tune of the Queenes Almayne.
author: Barker, John, ballad writer.
publisher: In Fleetestreate beneath the Conduit, at the signe of S. Iohn Euangelist, by Thomas Colwell,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
